in 2001 he said he was leaving

the Iraq war the popularity of his

thoughts confirmed that he'd completed

convinced that politics shouldn't be
about shoddy compromise my mother said
to me once to say all decisions
including political
are basically immoral is it right or
wrong Tony Benn often declared that

personality but today Westminster has
lost one of its most distinctive and
distinguished figures
